answers.answer: Amen!!
Made me cry this is very sad. Praying for your friend and her sweet baby.

Aw that is so sad I can't believe ppl are going thru this while other girls like it was mentioned before are upset that they don't get the gender they wished for. How's is that sweet little angel doing? Prayers go for ur friend and that little baby. Keep us post it plz
Poor little angel!! Please keep us updated!
So far I heard shes doing good. Thanks for the prayers they need all they can get! I couldn't imagine giving birth and then having my little girl taken right away
Yes that is heart breaking just thinking bout that.  Can't imagine how ur friend feels. Wish her and the baby all the best.

This is so sad. What is the best outcome for her baby? Have the doctors said? It also annoys me when I see people complaining about what gender their baby is. Or just always saying they hope they have a boy or they hope they have a girl. You get what you get and as long as that baby is healthy that is all that should matter.

She hasnt told me anything about her future but my brothers gf is a neonatal nurse and she said its a miracle if she does make it. And I saw a girl complaining earlier in the 18-24 forum and she was saying how she was disappointed that she was having a girl and they were hoping for a boy and a lot of ladies were agreeing saying the same thing. And all I could think about was my friend and what she's going through and seeing how selfish these women are
I couldn't imagine :(
Yeah it's sad
Did the doctors know she would be born without ears?:( sending prayers her way for her and her little miracle
May God give the little angel long and healthy life and and may God give all the mom healthy babies Ameen
No I dont think they knew which is crazy
Amen! Words very well said.
Well my friends baby passed away about an hour ago. Prayers for her and the family please.
I'm so sorry to hear that!  Prayers for her and her family.
Rip little baby
Oh my goodness so incredibly sad my heart is aching for her right now, I really hope she got to spend some time with her, I cannot imagine what they're going through. So sorry, sending prayers.
R.I.P to the precious angel xx prayers for the family
I'll the love in support and prayers to this family  amen

question: So I have a good friend that just had a baby and at her 20 week ultrasound she found out her little one had a heart disease and one kidney with a cyst on it. About a month ago she got admitted into the hospital because she had preeclampsia and high blood pressure. So last week at 36 weeks she had an emergency csection because of a lot of amniotic fluid. Her baby was born without ears and has spine problems. She didnt get to hold her at all cause they took her right away to do surgery on her heart and then yesterday she had another surgery for her kidney. As sad as this is im telling this story so we can be thankful that we have healthy babies and some ladies on here complain when they dont get what gender they want. Just feel blessed that your baby is healthy and that you are able to carry that little miracle.
title: just a story
